description.wurst.setting.freecam.apply_: What your keyboard and mouse inputs should do while Freecam is active.
Moves the camera around while your character stays still.
Moves your character while the camera stays still.
description.wurst.setting.freecam.horizo:
Horizontal camera movement speed when using Freecam.

Does nothing when §lApply §linput §lto§r is set to §lPlayer§r.
description.wurst.setting.freecam.vertic:
Vertical camera movement speed when using Freecam (relative to horizontal).

Does nothing when §lApply §linput §lto§r is set to §lPlayer§r.
description.wurst.setting.freecam.scroll:
Changes your camera movement speed when you scroll the mouse wheel.

Does nothing when §lApply §linput §lto§r is set to §lPlayer§r.
description.wurst.setting.freecam.show_s: Displays your current horizontal and vertical camera movement speed in the HackList.
description.wurst.setting.freecam.initia: Where to initially place the camera when you enable Freecam.
Keep the camera exactly where it is. You will only see the inside of your character until you move.
Move the camera forward a bit so you can see better.
Move the camera up a bit so you can see better.
description.wurst.setting.freecam.tracer: Draws a line to your character's actual position.
description.wurst.setting.freecam.hide_h: Hides your hand and held items while using Freecam.
description.wurst.setting.freecam.disabl: Automatically turns off Freecam when you take damage.
description.wurst.setting.freecam.exclud: Excludes you from WI Freecam's anonymous version statistics, which help me decide which old versions are still worth supporting. Opt out if you're paranoid, but know that no personal data is collected anyways.
